Do you like graphs? Grafana! What about storing time series? InfluxDB! And grabbing information from many sources easily? Telegraf! Here we go!

I gave a presentation at the SagLacIO on June 21 about Influxdb, telegraf and Grafana.

If you like this kind of stuff, have a look at the amazing obazoud/awesome-dashboard list! :D
